extendedInfo.description: Rediscover your romantic side and passion again with Social Flirt.  Social Flirt lets you find members near you by advanced compatibility matching. Extensive member profiles and compatibility tests ensure members find exactly who and what they're looking for. Please take the time to fill out your profile.  The more detailed you are, the better the matches. And with millions of members worldwide, the possibilities are endless. Sign up for a FREE membership and fill out your profile and we will give you a list of all your perfect matches.  You will be notified regularly with new matches. No need to enter a credit card to browse the members that are right for you. Then, you have the option of upgrading your account to get even more matches. If you sign up for 12 months, you get 6 months FREE.  That is a total of 18 months for only $5.99 a month. Isn't that worth finding your next perfect mate? Join now to find your perfect match. Keep this app on your phone so you can log in regularly.

reviews.title: Not really app but website shell
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unless your willing to pay once youve setup your profile its usless
reviews.author: A Google User
